title: Login
cleaned_text: To continue, please log in with your existing MyNAP account, create a free account, or download Complementary and Alternative Medicine in the United States as a guest. You can find additional resources through the [catalog page](https://nap.nationalacademies.org/catalog/11182/complementary-and-alternative-medicine-in-the-united-states). MyNAP members enjoy free access to thousands of National Academies reports, a 10% discount off every purchase at NAP.edu, and lots of great features. [Learn more.](http://nap.nationalacademies.org/content/help/mynaphelp.html) While logged in as a guest, you can download any of the free PDFs on NAP.edu. You'll remain logged in until you close your browser. Please enter the e-mail address you used when signing up for a MyNAP account. We will then e-mail you instructions for resetting your password. We just sent a message to . Follow the instructions in that email to reset your password.
